titleStmt.title: The sweet milke of Christian doctrine in a plaine and naturall method, by question and answere, for their better vnderstanding, for whom it is chiefly written.
titleStmt.author: Sym, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe, for Iohn Hodges,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; lacks all after leaf B8.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
